About Me

Howdy! My name is Tim Filipowski, I am a full stack web developer working with HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, Python, and React. My goal is to build websites that can make an impact on the world.

Please drop me a line with the "Contact" link in the NavBar. Cheers!
